alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Cleburne; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Talladega, south central Calhoun, southwestern Cleburne and north central Clay Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munford, or near Talladega, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Talladega, Ashland, Munford, Hobson City, Waldo, Grant Town, Talladega Superspeedway, Anniston Regional Airport, Talladega Municipal Airport, Mount Cheaha, Bynum, Eastaboga, Camp Mac, Jackson Shoals, Chandler Springs, Ironaton, Jenifer, Lake Chinnabee and Gunthertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
